attributes.action: Close Schools, Colleges and Universities and Return to Online Learning
attributes.additional_details: Going back to school full-time is having a detrimental impact on the mental health of students. Cases and deaths have spiked rapidly since the return to education.
attributes.background: Close schools again in order to tackle the coronavirus pandemic. Centre Assessed Grades should be given to anyone taking exams in 2021.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
